languages.text: "Мы были разными. Каждый из нас задумывался о перспективах подобного эксперимента, но я первым обрел решимость на него. Нихель вступила в проект для осуществления контроля — ей эксперимент представлялся опасно близким к свершению богохульства сотворения. Конклав поручил ей прекратить мои разработки — но она поверила в возможность успеха".

"We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as dangerously close to a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."
languages.original_text: "Мы были разными. Каждый из нас задумывался о перспективах подобного эксперимента, но я первым обрел решимость на него. Нихель вступила в проект для осуществления контроля — ей эксперимент представлялся опасно близким к свершению богохульства сотворения. Конклав поручил ей прекратить мои разработки — но она поверила в возможность успеха".

traits.locale_text: "We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as being dangerously close to committing a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced in the possibility of its success."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私たちはそうではなかった。それぞれがこうした実験の予測を立てていたが、実験を試みる決意を最初にしたのは私だった。ニヘルは実験を制御するためプロジェクトに加わった。というのも、彼女はこの実験を冒涜的な創造活動に近い危険なものと見なしていた。評議会は私の研究を終わらせるよう彼女に命じていたのだ。しかしニヘルはその成功がもたらす可能性を確信するようになった」
languages.original_text: "We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as dangerously close to a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはそうではなかった。それぞれがこうした実験の予測を立てていたが、実験を試みる決意を最初にしたのは私だった。ニヘルは実験を制御するためプロジェクトに加わった。というのも、彼女はこの実験を冒涜的な創造活動に近い危険なものと見なしていた。評議会は私の研究を終わらせるよう彼女に命じていたのだ。しかしニヘルはその成功がもたらす可能性を確信するようになった」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们各不相同。我们每个人都曾考虑过这个实验的前景，但我是第一个下定决心去尝试的人。妮赫尔加入这个项目是为了控制它，她认为这个实验近乎亵渎。秘会曾命令她终止我的研究，但她后来坚持认为，我的研究说不定有可能成功。”
languages.original_text: "We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as dangerously close to a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."

traits.locale_text: “我们各不相同。我们每个人都曾考虑过这个实验的前景，但我是第一个下定决心去尝试的人。雅珀加入这个项目是为了控制它，她认为这个实验近乎亵渎。秘会曾命令她终止我的研究，但她后来坚持认为，我的研究说不定有可能成功。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Nous étions différents. Nous avons tous envisagé les perspectives que pouvait apporter une telle expérience, mais j'ai été le premier à décider de la tenter. Si Nihel s'est jointe au projet, c'était pour le contrôler : pour elle, cette expérience était bien trop proche d'un acte blasphématoire de création pour être laissé sans surveillance. Mais le temps que le conclave m'ordonne de cesser mes recherches, elle était déjà convaincue que nous pouvions réussir. »
languages.original_text: "We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as dangerously close to a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."

traits.locale_text: « Nous étions différents. Nous avons tous envisagé les perspectives que pouvait apporter une telle expérience, mais j'ai été le premier à décider de la tenter. Si Nihel s'est jointe au projet, c'était pour le contrôler : pour elle, cette expérience était bien trop proche d'un acte blasphématoire de création pour être laissé sans surveillance. Mais le temps que le conclave m'ordonne de cesser mes recherches, elle était déjà convaincue que nous pouvions réussir. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Éramos diferentes. Todos tuvimos en cuenta las perspectivas del experimento, pero yo fui el primero en ganar determinación para intentarlo. Nihel se unió al proyecto para hacerse con el control: consideraba que el experimento corría el peligro de ser un acto blasfemo de creación. El cónclave le había ordenado que pusiera fin a mi investigación, pero se convenció de que saldría bien».
languages.original_text: "We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as dangerously close to a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."

traits.locale_text: «Éramos diferentes. Todos tuvimos en cuenta las perspectivas del experimento, pero yo fui el primero en ganar determinación para intentarlo. Nihel se unió al proyecto para hacerse con el control: consideraba que el experimento corría el peligro de ser un acto blasfemo de creación. El cónclave le había ordenado que pusiera fin a mi investigación, pero se convenció de que saldría bien».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Wir waren unterschiedlich. Jeder von uns dachte über die Folgen eines solchen Experiments nach, doch ich war der Erste, der die Entschlossenheit erlangte, es zu versuchen. Nihel schloss sich dem Projekt an, um die Kontrolle darüber zu erlangen: Für sie kam das Experiment einem blasphemischen Akt der Schöpfung gefährlich nahe. Die Konklave hatte ihr befohlen, meiner Forschung ein Ende zu setzen, doch sie gewann die Überzeugung, dass es Erfolg haben konnte."
languages.original_text: "We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as dangerously close to a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."

traits.locale_text: "Wir waren unterschiedlich. Jeder von uns dachte über die Folgen eines solchen Experiments nach, doch ich war der Erste, der die Entschlossenheit erlangte, es zu versuchen. Nihel schloss sich dem Projekt an, um die Kontrolle darüber zu erlangen: Für sie kam das Experiment einem blasphemischen Akt der Schöpfung gefährlich nahe. Die Konklave hatte ihr befohlen, meiner Forschung ein Ende zu setzen, doch sie gewann die Überzeugung, dass es Erfolg haben konnte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Önceden farklıydık. Her birimiz böylesi bir deneyden sağlanabilecek faydaları düşündük. Buna teşebbüs edecek kararlılığı elde eden ilk ben oldum. Nihel, projeye denetleme amacıyla katıldı. Deneyi, kâfirce bir yaratım eylemine tehlikeli derecede yakın bir şey olarak görüyordu. Meclis ona araştırmamı sonlandırmasını emretti. Nihel ise başarı ihtimali olduğuna ikna olmuştu."
languages.original_text: "We were different. Each one of us considered the prospects of such an experiment, but I was the first to gain the resolve to attempt it. Nihel joined the project to effect control over it: she regarded the experiment as dangerously close to a blasphemous act of creation. The conclave had ordered her to end my research, but she became convinced of the possibility of its success."

traits.locale_text: "Önceden farklıydık. Her birimiz böylesi bir deneyden sağlanabilecek faydalar üzerine değerlendirmeler yaptık ancak buna teşebbüs edecek kararlılığı elde eden ilk kişi bendim. Nihel projeye, onu denetlemek adına katıldı: Deneyi, kâfirce bir yaratım eylemine tehlikeli derecede yakın bir şey olarak değerlendiriyordu. Meclis ona, araştırmamı sonlandırma emri verdi ancak başarı ihtimali bulunduğuna ikna olmuştu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
